name: Seize the Night
description:
Seize the Night is a short romance VN in which you take in a stray cat only for it to turn out to be a vampire.

Seize the Night was written by Castle Veintiuna and produced by Ester Olsen.

Android version

Download the Android version from the downloads section below.

Controls

Seize the Night is a mouse-only game.

Drag to move the camera around the map. Click on things to interact with them.

Adjust camera sensitivity in the settings menu. To open the menu, click on the button in the top-right corner of the screen.
